PhyloAnalysis Documentation

================



This document will provide information and guidelines about using clustal omega and PAML \(with ete3\) in order to generate alignments and dN/dS data about orthologous genes.



Clustal Omega

-------------



\#\#\# Format Examples



\*\*Directory name:\*\* \`HTR1A\_CDS\`



\*\*CDS input filename:\*\* \`HTR1A\_Homo\_sapiens\_cds\_nucl.fasta\`



\*\*Fasta file format:\*\*



\`&gt;H\_sapiens\`

\`\`



\*\*CDS output file name:\*\* \`HTR1A\_cds\_nucl\_aligned.fasta\`



\#\#\# Analysis Parameters



\\`\\`



\#\#\# :bangbang: Notes



2 spaces should be after the species/common name in the fasta file.



The input and output file will be in fasta format.



ETE3 & PAML

-----------



\#\#\# Format Examples



\*\*Directory name:\*\* \`HTR1A\_PAML\`



\*\*Input tree file name:\*\* \`HTR1A\_Homo\_sapiens\_cds\_nucl.fasta\`



\*\*Output filenames:\*\*
